
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/morec/p/18841977" title="发布于 2025-04-22 23:32">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">firebase studio硬刚cursor,送免费云服务可跑32b大模型</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h1>谷歌IDX提供免费高配云服务器（16核CPU，64G内存，300G硬盘），无需绑卡，只需一个能正常使用的谷歌账号。这是一个非常强大的开发环境，特别适合运行大型AI模型和开发工作。</h1>
<h2>一、Google IDX的优势</h2>
<ul>
<li data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">强大的硬件配置：16核CPU、64G内存、300G硬盘空间</span></li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">完全免费：无需信用卡，只需谷歌账号</span></li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">预装多种开发环境：支持多种编程语言和框架</span></li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">云端开发：随时随地访问，无需担心本地硬件限制</span></li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">AI模型部署：足够强大运行32B参数量的大模型</span></li>
</ul>
<h2>二、适用场景</h2>
<ol>
<li value="1" data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">AI开发与实验：</span></li>
</ol>
<ul class="nested">
<li class="nested" data-indent="3">运行Ollama等本地大模型（如qwen2.5-coder:32b）</li>
</ul>
<ul class="nested">
<li class="nested" data-indent="3">使用Cursor、RooCode、Continue等AI编程助手</li>
</ul>
<ul class="nested">
<li class="nested" data-indent="3">进行机器学习模型训练和部署</li>
</ul>
<ol>
<li value="2" data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">开发环境：</span></li>
</ol>
<ul class="nested">
<li class="nested" data-indent="3">Web开发（前后端）</li>
</ul>
<ul class="nested">
<li class="nested" data-indent="3">移动应用开发</li>
</ul>
<ul class="nested">
<li class="nested" data-indent="3">数据分析与可视化</li>
</ul>
<ol>
<li value="3" data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">学习与研究：</span></li>
</ol>
<ul class="nested">
<li class="nested" data-indent="3">学习新技术而无需配置本地环境</li>
</ul>
<ul class="nested">
<li class="nested" data-indent="3">进行计算密集型研究</li>
</ul>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>有些agent想使用还是需要本地模型比较大token比较多才能跑，比如下面这些本地模型，白嫖一个qwen2.5-coder:32b到本地不是更爽。<br><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422194340871-2006387289.jpg" alt=""></p>
<p>下面介绍如何白嫖</p>
<p>访问https://studio.firebase.google.com/&nbsp; 登录谷歌账号，该勾选的勾选，进到下面界面:</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422194606380-1595198330.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;进入newworkspce可以创建的应用太多了</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422194926149-367455206.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;不废话，开胃菜，我首先建了一个netcore，</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422195138526-1838922604.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;拷贝地址访问如下：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422195218914-1384657660.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>下面就是白嫖一个linux，点击android studio cloud</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422195332717-337749836.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;取个名字，稍等几分钟</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422195502327-1424003979.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>随便点一个</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422195609071-101108614.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>叉掉android studio新建界面，然后按照下图</p>
<p>&nbsp;<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422195642270-1234194334.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422195722783-177402444.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;linux这就出来了，配置什么的自己看少不少你的。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422195847138-1091036003.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>一个ubuntu系统，软件系统升级，系统语言，中文输入法略， 然后通过Terminal安装ollama</p>
<pre class="language-text" data-role="codeBlock" data-info=""><code># 下载
wget  https://github.com/ollama/ollama/releases/download/v0.6.5/ollama-linux-amd64.tgz 到home下面，自己新建目录xxxx,然后解压进去。
# 修改文件属性
chmod +x /home/xxxx/bin/ollama

# 将路径加入用户PATH中(推荐)
export PATH=/home/xxxx/bin:$PATH

# 启动
ollama serve<br>先运行起来，再新建一个控制台</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422200657588-1951135113.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<pre class="language-text" data-role="codeBlock" data-info=""><code>等下装个中文输入法问他中国话</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202504/1099890-20250422200848120-727989151.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>三、注意事项与限制</h2>
<ol>
<li value="1" data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">系统重启：服务器会每2小时自动重启一次，但所有文件和程序都会保留</span></li>
</ol><ol>
<li value="2" data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">数据持久性：建议定期备份重要数据&nbsp;</span></li>
</ol><ol>
<li value="3" data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">网络访问：可以配置为外网访问，但需要额外设置</span></li>
</ol><ol>
<li value="4" data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">资源监控：使用<span class="markdown-inline-code leading-[1.4]">htop等工具监控系统资源使用情况</span></span></li>
</ol><ol>
<li value="5" data-indent="0"><span class="markdown-bold-text">可持续性：这是一项测试服务，Google可能随时调整政策</span></li>
</ol>
</div>

</div>
